org.oddjob.state

Class StructuralStateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oddjob.state.StructuralStateHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stateful

    public class StructuralStateHelper
extends Object
implements Stateful
    Track, and aggregate the states of child jobs. Aggregation is achieved using the given StateOperator.
    Author:
    rob

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StructuralStateHelper(Structural structural, StateOperator operator)
      Create a new instance that will track state changes in the children of the given Structural.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StructuralStateHelper

        public StructuralStateHelper(Structural structural,
                     StateOperator operator)
        Create a new instance that will track state changes in the children of the given Structural. States of the children will be combined using the given StateOperator.
        Parameters:
        structural - The structural. Must not be null.
        operator - The operator that combines child state. Must not be null.
